list.name: Changes
list.comment:
ble client app: Finished Adding GUI Dialogs
The base work for all GUI Dialogs for the application have been finished, and the Dialogs are all connected.
Work still needs to be done to formalise logging and to ensure the code is runnable via the command terminal.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Python tests.Python tests in test_api_funcs.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in test_ble_send.py.executor": "Run", "Python.API_Viewer_Dialog.executor": "Run", "Python.BLE_Client_Init_Dialog.executor": "Run", "Python.BLE_Client_Main_GUI_Dialog.executor": "Run", "Python.BLE_Client_Main_GUI_Screen.executor": "Run", "Python.BLE_Client_Utility_Init_Dialog.executor": "Run", "Python.Help_Init_Dialog.executor": "Run", "Python.Received_MSG_GUI_Dialog.executor": "Run", "Python.Received_MSG_GUI_Screen.executor": "Run", "Python.__main__.executor": "Run", "Python.access_api_definitions.executor": "Run", "Python.access_api_functions.executor": "Run", "Python.ble_service_scanner.executor": "Run", "Python.client.executor": "Run", "Python.gui_funcs.executor": "Run", "Python.main.executor": "Run", "Python.manual_cmds.executor": "Run", "Python.project_gui.executor": "Run", "Python.send_wifi_scan.executor": "Run", "Python.wifi_scan.executor": "Run", "Python.wifi_scan_testbench.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.OpenProjectViewOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/Users/marti/Documents/git_repos/ble_client", "settings.build.tools.auto.reload": "ALL", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "advanced.settings" } }

task.summary:
ble client app:
This application has now been developed such that running the (send_wifi_scan.py) script in the PyCharm terminal can succesfully send and receive messages over BLE GATT.
It has been shown to work consistently with the custom (example-packet-sniffer) app developed locally.

ble client app: initial gui integration
A GUI page has been made and integrated with the ble request handler such that we can trigger a generic BLE message from GUI text inputs.

ble client app: ble server response screen integration
A GUI page has been added and integrated with the main GUI setup page. This new page shows the reply from the BLE server in a scrollable Qt5 QLabel.

ble client app: Init Dialog Box Created + Refactor
A GUI page has been added and integrated that provides access to the BLE Dialog Box that configures a BLE message using the GUI.
To be integrated with the API server in the future.

ble client app: API Created (Tests Not Made Yet)
An API has been created that allows us to configure a message to send over BLE GATT. The API is exposed on (http://127.0.0.1:5900).
Further Refactoring was also done on GUI functions to make the code more re-usable outside of the GUI.

ble client app: API Tests Created
A test suite (test_api_funcs.py) has been created for the API functions.
This commit also includes some minor refactoring across multiple files to help made the code more readable and accessible.

ble client app: API Dialog Added
A new Dialog in the GUI was created for the RESTful API.
This Dialog was integrated with the application Init Dialog.

ble client app: Finished Adding GUI Dialogs
The base work for all GUI Dialogs for the application have been finished, and the Dialogs are all connected.
Work still needs to be done to formalise logging and to ensure the code is runnable via the command terminal.
